name: README Auto-Update
description: Automatically updates README.md when any project file is modified to reflect current state

action.prompt:
A file has been modified: {{filePath}}

Review the changes and update README.md if necessary. Focus on:
- New features or functionality added
- API endpoint changes
- Configuration changes
- Setup/installation steps
- Architecture changes

Only update README.md if the changes are significant enough to warrant documentation updates. Keep updates concise and relevant.
